text: Villanovafranca (Biddanoa Franca, Bidda Noa Franca in Sardinian) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Italian region of Sardinia, located about north of Cagliari and about northeast of Sanluri. As of 2016, 1,345 people lived there. Its area is 27.59 kmÂ².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 292 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Villanovafranca
